trc.key.category.name: The Rettington Companion
trc.option.chat.optimized_chat_size.desc: Increases the chat box size to better fit longer messages.
trc.option.chat.section.general.title: General
trc.option.chat.title: Chat
trc.option.chat.more_messages.title: More chat messages
trc.option.chat.more_messages.descriptio: Increases the number of chat messages that are kept in memory.
trc.option.chat.keep_messages_on_disconn: Keeps chat messages in the chat box when you switch servers or singleplayer worlds.
trc.option.general.gamma_preset.descript: Select a gamma value or choose 'Settings' for the Minecraft gamma setting.
trc.option.general.gamma_preset.title: Gamma preset
trc.option.general.title: General
trc.option.inventory.auto_restock.descri: Automatically restocks blocks in your hotbar when you place the last one of a stack.
trc.option.inventory.auto_restock.title: Auto restock
Items are moved instantly when using shift + hover over an item in inventories.
trc.option.inventory.title: Inventory
trc.option.visuals.show_armor_hud.descri: Toggles the display of the armor items on the screen.
trc.option.visuals.show_armor_hud.title: Show Armor HUD
trc.option.visuals.show_arrow_hud.descri: Toggles the display of the number of arrows in your inventory on the screen.
trc.option.visuals.show_arrow_hud.title: Show Arrow HUD
trc.option.visuals.title: Overlay
trc.option.visuals.visible_equipment_mod: Hides equipment models from yourself and from other players.
trc.option.visuals.day_time_value.title: Day time value
trc.option.visuals.day_time_value.descri: Sets the time of day in the world to a fixed value (only client-side).
